name: Health Level 7
description: International standards for transfer of clinical and administrative data between software applications

name: International Classification of Diseases, 9th Revision
description: Medical classification list by the World Health Organization containing codes for diseases, signs and symptoms

name: International Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision
description: Medical classification list by the World Health Organization containing codes for diseases, signs and symptoms

name: ICD-11
description: International Classification of Diseases, 11th Revision, the latest WHO classification for mortality, morbidity statistics and clinical documentation.

name: Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine Clinical Terms
CIEL
description: Columbia International eHealth Laboratory dictionary, a comprehensive clinical terminology system designed for use in low-resource settings.

name: Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes
description: Universal standard for identifying medical laboratory observations

name: GS1
description: Global Standards One, an international standard for supply chain management and product identification in healthcare.
